name: Mew ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Versatile
poke_body.effect: Mew ex can use the attacks of all Pokémon in play as its own. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Power Move
attacks.effect: Search your deck for an Energy card and attach it to Mew ex. Shuffle your deck afterward. Then, you may switch Mew ex with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
